content.description: Tread the easy ground past 5 bolts towards the lip of the overhang. Tom Cruise over this amazing section. Delicately move through significantly more thin moves passing 6 bolts to boat anchor! Enjoy the quiet view. Now bring your belayer up the line.
content.protection: 11 bolts to rap chains anchor. Best to lead, top belay, then rap the chasm!
content.location: Obvious 1st route climbers left of Vole Chasm.  2nd route to the left of Communion Route.  There are only 4 routes on the slabs.  Try them.

content.description: Follow edges, and small incuts past 5 bolts to a small sloping ledge. Crux is just before the ledge. Climb easier 5.7 face to the chains. As always at the Testament Slabs, helmets are a must!
content.protection: 11 quickdraws + 2 shoulder length alpine draws. Chains at top with quicklinks. 11 bolts to chain anchor.
content.location: Same approach as for Communion. Once at the base of Communion, follow the base of the slab to the left, about 250 feet. Brother's Keeper is to the right of an obvious gully with a big roof in it. Please stay off of the route to the left of the gully. That is a project that is not finished yet.

content.description:
A cool climb in a cool valley. Lots and lots of bolts. A bit chossy, don't wander off the scrub line, wear your damn helmet, do NOT bring your dog!

Pitch 1, 5.7: Lots of bolts to a good ledge.

Pitch 2, 5.8: Pretty chossy, tread lightly to a decent belay.

Pitch 3, 5.10a: Best pitch of the climb, less chossy to a good ledge.

Pitch 4, 5.9+: Not super chossy to a hanging belay at the lip of the wall.

Anything less than a 70m rope will leave you short rapping pitches two and four.

Thanks to the total badasses who put the amazing effort into bolting this thing!

The more it's climbed, the cleaner it’ll get!

Pitch 1 (14 bolts)

Face climb in-cut and grooves in rock past 5 bolts to a good ledge, continue moving up crux 5.10+(maybe harder) face through bolt line, thin ground up over bulge to a 2 bolt belay anchor with chains.  100ft.
content.protection: 15-Quick draws & shoulder runners! Need 1-60M rope (rappel route!)
content.location: Start 15 ft. right of Communion Route
